text: @realDonaldTrump Translation: Pay no attention to things now, and the over 103K deaths from COVID19, 40M+ unemployed, or the massive protests in 50 states all due to my unmitigated failure as a president. Look months down the road...November, December, or even next year for progress. What a loser
